Plot: Supernova chronicles the search and rescue patrol of a medical ship in deep space in the early 22nd century and its six-member crew which includes a Captain and Pilot, a co-pilot, a medical...
Title: Supernova
Writer: William Malone (story), Daniel Chuba (story), David C. Wilson (screenplay)
Actors: James Spader, Angela Bassett, Robert Forster, Lou Diamond Phillips
tomatoConsensus: This is an insult to the Sci-fi genre with no excitement and bad FX.
